about_the_game:
Memory Oblivion Box - Original Soundtrack.

Including wav (CD quality) & mp3 format.

Album contains:

  • 01 - Fresh air
  • 02 - Shiny day
  • 03 - Optimistic attitude
  • 04 - Last second
  • 05 - Black truth
  • 06 - Foggy memory
  • 07 - Mysterious word
  • 08 - Little happiness
  • 09 - Sincere heart
  • 10 - Start again
  • 11 - Colorful hope
  • 12 - Stay alone
  • 13 - Hiemal feather
  • 14 - The moment
  • 15 - The moment（music box ver）
  • 16 - Dark shock
  • 17 - 忆
  • 18 - 忆（instrumental）
